H0.text: What gemstone is The Moonstone in the classic novel of that name by Wilkie Collins. Opal

H1.text: What gemstone is The Moonstone in the classic novel of that name by Wilkie Collins. Diamond

H2.text: What gemstone is The Moonstone in the classic novel of that name by Wilkie Collins. Pearl

H3.text: What gemstone is The Moonstone in the classic novel of that name by Wilkie Collins. Bortz

A4.text: The Moonstone of the title is a diamond (not to be confused with the semi-precious moonstone gem)
